commentBody: I don't have to look at someone's full resume to disqualify them for ONE reason. Salad can have leafy lettuce, juicy cucumbers, ripe tomatoes, onions, I like all those things. But since I do not eat pork, and this salad contains pulled pork, I will put the entire thing in the garbage. This is a similar situation. Sure, Harvard degree, veteran, successful financier, those are all really, really likable things. But the White nationalism, homophobia, and misogyny ruin the whole salad for me.
